Sentencas: The present renewable energy systems should shift towards more storage-based systems due to their inherent intermittency.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: This study examines the electrochemical, energy, and exergy performances of a Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (ReSOC) based stand-alone energy storage system with a pressurized gas tank.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: The system operates in the fuel cell mode (SOFC) for power generation and electrolysis cell mode (SOEC) for syngas production.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: The exergy analysis gives a detailed insight into the irreversibility points in both system operation modes.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: The ReSOC system model is based on a validated ReSOC stack electrochemical model and system components' massenergy balance model.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: The power extraction level in the ReSOC stack was shown to determine the thermal management required through the electrochemical analysis.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: The energy analysis resulted in a system roundtrip efficiency of 51 % at the considered operating conditions.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: In addition, the highest points of exergy loss/destruction are the exhaust air (SOFC: 32 %, SOEC: 34 %), ReSOC stack (SOFC: 25 %, SOEC: 28 %), and pressure regulation valve (SOFC: 11 %, SOEC: 17 %).
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: The results also show that the SOEC mode performed better than the SOFC mode in the energy and exergy analyses.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system

Sentencas: This study may be used as a basis for stand-alone system performance improvement leading to higher efficiency.
Titulo: Electrochemical-energy- exergy analysis of reversible solid oxide cell-based small-scale stand-alone energy storage system
